about:
I am an experienced frontend developer with a strong focus on building applications for both mobile and web platforms. 

I have worked extensively with technologies such as React, Firebase, MongoDB, SQL, and have some backend experience using Node.js and ExpressJS. 

What really motivates me is the opportunity to learn new things at a rapid pace. I thrive on challenges and enjoy expanding my skillset with the latest technologies and frameworks. 

Throughout my development journey, I have worked on several interesting projects which include website and dashboards for college fests and a hospital. I also had the priviledge of being a part of a student-led dedevloper club.

Here are the few technologies I've been working with recently:

TypeScript,React Native,NextJS,Supabase
bio: I'm a Full Stack Web and App Developer and also a freelancer looking for oppurtunities
